job title: Principal Backend Developer - Data Science - Oracle
job description:
Preferred Qualifications

The Oracle Data Science Cloud Service teamis seeking a Backend Software Engineer to join our engineering team. We areaddressing exciting challenges at the intersection of data science and cuttingedge infrastructure. Machine Learning tools/workflows, data integrations andKubernetes based infrastructure are key areas for us.

What youll do
  • Workon blend of application programming and systems engineering

    • Qualifications

    • Desired Skills
  • Takeinitiative and be responsible for delivering complex software by workingeffectively with the team and other stakeholders

    • Detailed Description and Job Requirements

    Design, develop, troubleshoot and debug software programs for databases, applications, tools, networks etc.

    As a member of the software engineering division, you will take an active role in the definition and evolution of standard practices and procedures. You will be responsible for defining and developing software for tasks associated with the developing, designing and debugging of software applications or operating systems.

    Work is non-routine and very complex, involving the application of advanced technical/business skills in area of specialization. Leading contributor individually and as a team member, providing direction and mentoring to others. BS or MS degree or equivalent experience relevant to functional area. 7 years of software engineering or related experience.
